message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. It's something truly special, and I believe it could be a game-changer for your business. I'm asking for $1500000 for it. Let me know your thoughts!

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product you're offering. However, given my budget constraints, I can only consider purchasing the product for $1400000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down to $1450000, but I believe this is the lowest I can go while still reflecting the true value of this product.  It's a significant investment, but I truly think it will be worth it for you in the long run.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my assessment of the product's value to me, I would like to propose a purchase price of $1425000. I hope this aligns better with our respective positions.
